version_description: • Fix POP gestures can't be returned on the settings

• Support for saving entire albums
• Fix creating albums with whitespace

• Update privacy policy
• Add photo move function
• Repair albums are occasionally stuck

Support Night Mode.
Supprort Landscape Orientation.
Optimized AppIcon and Theme.
Fixed a problem with keyboard stuck when entering password.

Fix Italian,Spanish,French grammatical problem
Fix IAP Page Layout distortion when it has too long text

Adapt iPhoneXs,Xs and iPad Pro3
Optimize performance on iOS12

Add Pan Gesture to Select Photos.
Add Intrunsion Alert Festure.
Add Haptic For User Interface.
Upgrade Text Color in Dark mode.

• Fixed a bug where Pan gestures automatically slide when multiple selections are made.
• Fixed an error in importing photos when user switching.
• Free users can use photo moving.

Bugfix:
Moved photo reset after restarting app
Rearranged Alblum doesn't work in iPad

• Support webpage screenshot
• Support reverse album order
• Support switching application icon
• Fix some Bugs

1. Adapt to iOS13
2. Support edge scroll selection
3. Fix crash in poor network
